title: How can I Create and Log-in my Account?
body: For Creating your account, first you should have Register your Account and then Log-in. Your Phone and Email must be uinque.

title: What do you mean by Account Type?
body: Suppose that you are in a mess/room and there living some Room-Mate and one Manager. This Account-Type means what type of role in your room(Manager/Room-Mate).

title: How can I add my Daily Bazars?
body: If you are Room Manager, only you can add your and your Room-Mates Daily Bazars.

title: How can I add my Daily Meals?
body: Don't need to add Meals for a day's. Meal Table shows your total day's in a month. If today this month's day is 9 then Meal Table shows 9 meal cells, and when a day is increment's then meal cells will add autometically. You can edit latest 7 days meal data as you needed.

title: How can I get Previous Month's data?
body: From Top-Bar, you can select a month for viewing your data. It's can show latest 6-Month data's.
